content:
It sounds like you're looking for a mix of iconic sites, cultural experiences, and some relaxation. I've got just the thing for you!

Here's a suggested 5-day itinerary for your trip to New York City:

Day 1: Iconic NYC Landmarks

* Start at the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island (book ferry tickets in advance)
* Walk across the Brooklyn Bridge for stunning city views
* Visit the 9/11 Memorial & Museum
* End the day with a sunset view from the Top of the Rock Observation Deck

Day 2: Art, Culture, and Food

* Spend the morning at the Metropolitan Museum of Art (MET)
* Grab lunch at a classic NYC diner or try a slice of pizza at Joe's Pizza
* Visit the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) in the afternoon
* Enjoy a Broadway show or live music at the Blue Note Jazz Club in the evening

Day 3: Central Park and the Upper East Side

*
